about_the_game:
Hypnomemoria is an adventure game where the player gets a chance to visit a psychiatric clinic. Game contains a non-linear story with many possible game endings which you can get after making different choices – while talking to other patients/friends/etc, choosing your actions and so on. You can also enjoy different puzzles and mini-games that represent things like daily activities or therapies, hospital activities and many others!



Meet Oliver! A new patient in a psychiatric clinic “Holy days”. With an innovative treatment “Hypnomemoria” he will be able to relive the traumatic memory to rethink his choices and past events. Will Oliver be able to overcome his past or will he be forever pressured by the old wound?



Welcome to a wonderful world of psychiatric treatment:
  • Nonlinear gameplay: Help Oliver to heal his wound. Or perhaps you don’t want to help him? Choose your path.
  • Communication: Meet various patients and workers, it won’t be boring at all!
  • Exploring: An innovative therapy? But what if it hides something? It’s time to solve the mystery of that place!
  • Puzzles: Visit different specialists and get to know your emotions by exploring different classic therapies via mini-games.
  • Story: Are you brave enough to dive into your past? Well, let’s get started with therapy then!

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains themes of anxiety, depression and suicide and may be uncomfortable for someone. Graphics also contain bright and flashing images/effects which may cause discomfort and/or seizures for people with photosensitive epilepsy. We recommend observing your feelings and being cautious while playing. Please, stop playing if you feel any type of uncomfortability.

short_description: Oliver got a chance to receive therapy in one of the greatest psychiatric clinics. However, for that he’ll have to try a new experimental type of treatment. Will that therapy heal him or leave a bigger wound?
